name: sustainable-classroom-lms
description: Full-stack LMS with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: cd client && npm ci && VITE_API_URL='' npm run build && mkdir -p ../backend/public && cp -r dist/* ../backend/public/
scripts.build:win: cd client && npm ci && set VITE_API_URL= && npm run build && if not exist ..\backend\public mkdir ..\backend\public && xcopy dist\* ..\backend\public\ /E /Y
scripts.install:all: cd client && npm ci && cd ../backend && npm ci
